author: fielding
msg: Just a small change... a tiny little wafer... oops... Avalanche!
Rewrite patent section to tighten language, make it apply to derived
works, and yet still only apply to patented algorithms introduced
by the contributor.  This should hopefully address the concerns of
Ceki and Brian without causing big contributors to run away screaming.
Add stuff to definition of the Work and License to make it less circular
and correct the example to better match newer examples written by Rosen.
Realign short version with long version and update word counts.
